title: Maritime Route Deconfliction
description: A planner must deconflict the transit route of a carrier strike group with commercial shipping lanes and a known submarine threat area.

tasks.description: Plot the desired route for the carrier strike group.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately inputs the intended path.

tasks.description: Overlay commercial shipping lane data and intelligence data on submarine threat areas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a comprehensive map showing all constraints.

tasks.description: Adjust the strike group's route to avoid the highest-density shipping lanes and the submarine threat area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a safer, deconflicted route for the naval force.
